dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Takedown Notification [Notice ID: 22792]]
dmca.body:
En


-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 2004 9:35 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; marvel@copyright-compliance.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Takedown Notification [Notice ID: 22792]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Takedown Notification   [Notice ID: 22792]
Date: Mon, 25 Oct 2004 20:24:22 -0700
From: marvel@copyright-compliance.com
Reply-To: marvel@copyright-compliance.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Frwy - Suite 110






Re:         Unauthorized Use of "Marvel" Property
Notice ID: 22792
Notice Date: 25 Oct 2004 19:33:00 GMT
Case ID: 2071501


Dear Sir or Madam:

I certify under penalty of perjury that I am an agent authorized to act
on behalf of Marvel Characters, Inc. and Marvel Enterprises, Inc.
(collectively "Marvel"), the owner of certain valuable intellectual
property rights.  Marvel is the owner of all trademark, copyright and
other intellectual property rights in and to the comic books published
under the Marvel imprints, including, but not limited to, SPIDER-MAN,
X-MEN, DAREDEVIL, CAPTAIN AMERICA, THE FANTASTIC FOUR, THE PUNISHER, THE
HULK, and many others (the "Marvel Properties").  Because of these
rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell
and/or offer for sale products/services utilizing the Marvel Properties
without the express written permission of Marvel.
"Marvel", Inc. and its affiliated companies (collectively, "Marvel") are
the exclusive owners of copyrights in (description of property),
including the (property) listed below.

It has come to our attention that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
is the service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file
serving, file "swapping" or other similar activities) of "Marvel"'s
(property)(s) listed below is taking place. We believe that the Internet
access of the user engaging in this infringement is provided by
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. or a downstream service provider
who purchases this connectivity from ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act . Depending
upon the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is
providing to this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable
liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the
(property)(s) listed below, or if it fails to implement a policy that
provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see,
17 U.S.C.
